# elements

**Instance Property**

The device’s elements as key-value pairs for lookup by name.

## Declaration

```swift
var elements: GCPhysicalInputElementCollection<any GCPhysicalInputElement> { get }
```

## Accessing elements

- **axes**: The device’s axes as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **buttons**: The device’s buttons as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **dpads**: The device’s directional pads as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **switches**: The device’s switches as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **subscript(_:)**: Returns the element that the key specifies.

items.description: The device’s axes as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
items.name: axes

items.description: The device’s buttons as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
items.name: buttons

items.description: The device’s directional pads as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
items.name: dpads

items.description: The device’s switches as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
items.name: switches

items.description: Returns the element that the key specifies.
items.name: subscript(_:)
